testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to log into the Student Panel with a username and password.
testcase.name: The user must be able to log in with the correct username and password.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the student login tab...............................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed Then The user verifies that username texbox, password texbox and Sign In button are visible on the opened page.passed And The user enters "studentUsername_dgn" into the username textbox.........passed And The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox................passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page..........passed Then The user verifies that the url of the opened page is "studendPageUserUrl"..passed And User closes the page....................................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to log into the Student Panel with a username and password.
testcase.name: If the username and password combination is incorrect, the user should receive an error message - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed Given The user clicks on the student login tab..............................passed Given The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser............passed Given User enters possible wrong "studentUsername_dgn" or wrong "wrongPassword" in username texbox and in password textbox.passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page..........passed Given The user should receive an error message your password or username invalid.passed Given User closes the page..................................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to log into the Student Panel with a username and password.

testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed Given The user clicks on the student login tab..............................passed Given The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser............passed Given User enters possible wrong "wrongUserName" or wrong "password_dgn" in username texbox and in password textbox.passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page..........passed Given The user should receive an error message your password or username invalid.passed Given User closes the page..................................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to log into the Student Panel with a username and password.
testcase.name: If a user forgets the password, they should be redirected to the "Forgot Password" page.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the student login tab...............................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed And The user clicks the Forgot Password link................................passed Then The user verifies that the title of the page that opens is Forgot Password.passed And User closes the page....................................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to log into the Student Panel with a username and password.
testcase.name: The new password should be min 6 char
